VIBRATION_CRITICAL.action: Check Coupling Alignment and Foundation Bolts immediately. Assess runner integrity for cavitation pitting.

BEARING_TEMP_CRITICAL.action: Inspect oil levels and cooling water flow. Check for filter clogging or bearing clearance issues.

INSULATION_CRITICAL.action: Perform drying cycle or cleaning of stator windings. Inspect cable terminations for moisture.

CAVITATION_INFERRED.action: Adjust wicket gate opening to move out of the high-vortex zone. Perform tailwater level audit.

STRUCTURAL_RISK.action: Reduce unit load/pressure. Perform ultrasonic wall thickness test on spiral casing.
